description: A nice trail up to Bladderwort pond and then looping back down via trails on the Highland Road side of Thetis Lake Park. A few very steep sections.  Great views of Esquimalt Harbour.
directions: Start at the main parking lot of Thetis Lake Park and then head into the park via the ROAD towards the lake.  On the right there is a sign for Lewis Clark Trail. Start here.
title: Bladderwort Pond/Highland Loop
